mapper.select: SELECT m_no, m_name, m_email, m_password, m_phone, to_char(M_DATE,'yyyy/MM/dd') as m_date FROM members ORDER BY m_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lendplace VALUES ( lendplace_seq.nextval, #{l_name}, #{l_email}, #{l_phone}, #{l_title}, #{l_addr}, #{l_content}, #{l_rep_img}, #{l_pnum}, #{l_sdate}, #{l_edate}, 0, 0, sysdate )
